Pre-Game Insights: With a win tonight, Mike Budenholzer would win his 500th career regular season game as an NBA head coach, becoming the 38th coach in league history to the milestone
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns have made 470 three-pointers in the first 33 games of this season, the most in franchise history in the first 33 games of a season
Devin Booker needs 450 more points to surpass Walter Davis as the Suns all-time leading scorer
Others: The Suns enter this season having reached the playoffs in each of the last four seasons, matching their longest such stretch (four-straight from 2005-2008) since doing so in 13-straight from 1989-2001
Since the start of the 2020-21 season, the Suns hold a combined regular season record 224-127, the second-best record in the NBA over the last five seasons (trails Boston)
